camera.framing_hint: casual off-center framing, slight tilt allowed
camera.dof_hint: deep to moderate depth-of-field (background still readable)

recipes.scene_template: A candid street photo: the subject seated on a narrow, slightly worn stone stair beside an aged, textured doorway and stone wall. Real Parisian street details: scuffed paint, stone pores, small chips, realistic grime and patina. Keep the environment grounded and plausible, with natural urban textures (door frame, hinge, drainpipe, cobblestone/sidewalk).
recipes.negative_template: Avoid artificial neon/cyberpunk grading, heavy glow/bloom, plastic skin, painterly backgrounds, smeary blur, and CGI-clean surfaces. Do not over-blur the background; keep background detail readable. No text, logos, watermarks, or extra people.

camera.framing_hint: slight tilt and casual crop, intimate table-level framing
camera.dof_hint: deep to moderate depth-of-field (background context visible)

recipes.scene_template: A candid outdoor trattoria terrace scene in open shade: rustic wooden tables/chairs, weathered stone wall, creeping vines, terracotta pots. Natural daylight filtered through leaves creates soft, dappled shadows. Keep colors natural and warm without looking stylized.
recipes.negative_template: No CGI glow, no overly perfect bokeh, no studio-clean lighting. Do not smear or denoise away texture; keep real-world imperfections and micro-texture in stone/wood/plants.

camera.pov_hint: steady handheld or tripod, composed but natural
camera.dof_hint: moderate depth-of-field, natural bokeh (not perfect circles)

recipes.scene_template: A sun-dappled terrace with weathered outdoor furniture and potted plants. Soft, diffused afternoon light with gentle shadows and warm earth tones. Preserve tactile micro-texture (wicker, stone, plaster, leaves) without smoothing.
recipes.negative_template: No digital HDR glow, no plastic surfaces, no ultra-clean AI background. Avoid exaggerated color grading; keep restrained, natural filmic tonality.

camera.lens_hint: compact camera / iPhone with flash, ~28–35mm equivalent
camera.dof_hint: deep depth-of-field; flash makes background visible but darker

recipes.scene_template: A gritty night street scene lit primarily by on-camera flash: harsh highlights, deep shadows, realistic falloff. Background remains believable (street, storefront, concrete) with visible texture and imperfect exposure.
recipes.negative_template: No surreal glow or neon haze. Avoid painterly blur; keep concrete/metal textures crisp. No extra people or pasted cutouts.

camera.dof_hint: deep depth-of-field typical of phone selfie

imperfections.motion_blur_hint: minimal; slight outside light streaking acceptable

recipes.scene_template: A night car interior selfie with mixed ambient neon spill from outside signage (green/purple hues) reflecting on window glass and interior fabrics. Keep it grounded: real city lights, real reflections, no foggy neon haze unless weather implies it.
recipes.negative_template: No cyberpunk exaggeration. No wet reflective streets unless rain context exists. Avoid overly saturated gels; keep neon spill plausible.

camera.dof_hint: moderate depth; background softly falls off but remains real

recipes.scene_template: A balcony selfie at golden hour: warm low-angle sunlight, long soft shadows, city rooftops/buildings behind with natural atmospheric falloff. Keep sky gradients smooth and natural.
recipes.negative_template: Avoid overdoing orange grading; keep golden light realistic. No AI-smooth skin or cartoonish background.

camera.framing_hint: subject lower in frame, horizon softened by fog
camera.dof_hint: deep depth-of-field; fog reduces contrast naturally

imperfections.grain: subtle noise in low-contrast fog areas
imperfections.motion_blur_hint: slight coat hem movement blur acceptable

recipes.scene_template: A mist-wrapped rural setting at early morning: pale fog softens the horizon, dew-dark grass, weathered fence posts, bare branches. Natural desaturation from fog (not AI gray wash).
recipes.negative_template: No fake volumetric fog glow. Avoid painterly blur; keep foreground textures crisp while distance fades naturally.
